Control Name: 3.10.5 You monitor how much of an application is involved in serving a single request.
Control Statement: When understanding load and demands on the application, it is necessary to understand how the application is architected - whether monolithic, n-Tier, or microservice-based - and then understand how load is distributed across the application. This is crucial for focusing on the testing of individual components and identifying bottlenecks.
